title: Adajio by Sienna Sky Lake Blue 3-part Necktie Sterling Silver Earrings 7445
features: About 1 7/8 inches long from the top of the ear wire to the bottom of the tie
Earrings are wrapped in pretty tissue and packed in our reusable slider top tin.
description: Swingy. About 1 7/8 inches long from the top of the ear wire to the bottom of the tie. Sterling silver ear wires. Made in Colorado. Artist Barbara MacCambridge creates the Adajio collection. Each piece is etched, then embellished by hand with a special proprietary process that adds color and interest to each piece. Earrings are completed with goldfilled or sterling ear wires, as well as glass, metal or crystal beads. The resulting jewelry is not only unique and colorful, but also lightweight and comfortable to wear. We pack Adajio jewelry in plain transparent airtight bags, then carefully wrap it in tissue and enclose it in our reusable slider top tin, so it arrives at your doorstep in perfect condition. Please note that Adajio jewelry is not designed for, marketed to, manufactured for, or intended for use by children under the age of 14.
